extendedInfo.description: Real-time flight tracking from the industry leaders. Track flights with 1 end in N. America live & save them to your My Trips list. Get instant alerts when flight status changes. Easily share your trip itinerary or flight status. View a national airport delay map with weather.  Optimized for both phone and tablets!  See FlightView-Flight Tracker app for no ads.

reviews.title: Does not track live
reviews.comment: Unlike Flight Aware this app reported my flight on time, although it was delayed on the tarmac for 3 hours and then rescheduled. Poor app, false description. Don\'t bother.
reviews.author: Anna Offerman

reviews.title: Great up, just needs bug fixed
reviews.comment: My husband is a flight attendant so I like to watch his flights and make sure he gets every where safe. But today I\'ve been trying to track him but it only \"loads\" after I put all the information in. My connection is fine so there must be something going on with the app. Please fix.
reviews.author: Mia Spratt

reviews.title: Still slow and cumbersome.
reviews.comment: Updates still about 20 minutes behind and parts of widget are unreadable. :(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Did not have same estimated time
reviews.comment: Two other apps and the airline website had a later reported arrival time than this one. Was not as accurate
reviews.author: Lena Sims

reviews.title: Easy to use
reviews.comment: I use it to check on flights of family and friends. Seems accurate so far. Easy to read and easy to use. I would recommend.
reviews.author: David B

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: I\'m on the road often and use the app sometimes in  unconventional ways,eg; what other airlines operate flts to my destination, use the map tab to view weather system, during delays being able to follow the inbound aircraft # is priceless.#LOVEIT
reviews.author: Malinda Cross

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I used this to track an incoming flight, had I not used it I would have been 40 minutes behind picking up.  It informed me that the flight was early, so Ileft home early.  Will use again.  Oh, I like the real time elevation and speeds too.  Pretty neat.
reviews.author: Carrie Eggers

reviews.title: great map
reviews.comment: may not have the best looking icon but has better features than some paid flight trackers. always come back to this one. Map is accurate and notification instantly useful without learning curve.
reviews.author: Yusheng Chang

reviews.title: Has potential but interface needs more thought.
reviews.comment: The performance is good but the interface is anything but intuitive.  It will be frustrating to the casual user since even a long time system\'s developer finds it awkward to use.
reviews.author: P Duff

reviews.title: Slow
reviews.comment: flight is delayed but still says its on time
reviews.author: Ben Tanner

reviews.title: Make it work on WiFi please.
reviews.comment: Right now I can only get flight updaetes at home since around aiports they only transmit WiFi.  This means I can\'t get updates at the airport or anywhere else.  Nobody in Canada allows guest internet access anymore.
reviews.author: Rob Stirling

reviews.title: Downloaded because I needed it today. Useless.
reviews.comment: I\'m tracking an arriving flight that lands in four hours.  The delay was already 35 minutes four hours ago, and just changed to 49 minutes.  This flight is regularly at least 60 minutes delayed (Hooray Spirit Airlines!)   This app still shows \"on time-scheduled.\"  Not helpful at all.
reviews.author: Matt Pelphrey

reviews.title: Don\'t waste U R time if in AZ
reviews.comment: I live in Phx and it is off an hour ... maybe because Az doesn\'t use daylight savings time ... one would think the programmers would know this.
reviews.author: Roger Nash

reviews.title: Very very easy to use
reviews.comment: I tried several apps and they were all very hard to use. I tried flight aware and they only track flight\'s for 8 hours in advance. (Intnl) I could even bring up my flight info. My daughter flies in from China next week she has been gone a year. My phone galaxy note 2.
reviews.author: Karl Atkins

reviews.title: Delayed
reviews.comment: At airport now delayed two hours and although last minute delay, status still not updated. Otherwise pretty good app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty good.
reviews.comment: Seem to work well, I can track flights easily once they are entered into the trip.
reviews.author: Luke Clement

reviews.title: Love this app.
reviews.comment: Very handy! I use it to track the flights of family & friends. Nice to know when they land or when they are delayed. Thank you for this useful and FREE app!
reviews.author: Dusty H

reviews.comment: IM a chauffeur. Great app. Thx
reviews.author: A Google User
